feature.label: MDL Editor
feature.description: This feature provides an Eclipse Editor for the Model Description Language. This a language developed by the DDMoRe project to describe Pharmacometric models and can be used to produce models compatibl with standard M&S tools.
feature.copyright: Copyright Pfizer Inc 2015-2016 and Leiden University 2014-2015
